summary: An email from August 23, 2019, forwarding a list of items recovered from the execution of a search warrant at Little St James Island (LSJ) and a related tactical plan. The email is sent by a detective from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force to assist with drafting the search warrant for those items.

persons.name: Detective
persons.role: NYPD / FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force Detective
persons.context: The sender of the email, who is providing attachments related to items recovered from the Little St James search warrant to assist with drafting the search warrant for those items.

events.title: Search of Little St James Island
events.description: A search warrant was executed at Little St James Island (LSJ), resulting in the recovery of numerous items.

keyFacts: A search warrant was executed at Jeffrey Epstein's private island, Little St James (LSJ), on or before August 12, 2019.
Numerous items were recovered during this search, as detailed in an attached list.
A tactical plan for the search was also created, detailing how different buildings on the island were labeled.
The recovered items and tactical plan were being used to draft a formal search warrant for those specific items in August 2019.
The communication involves the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force, indicating a multi-agency investigation.
